name: Get exercise
description: Проверяет получение задания по его ID через API.

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that 'title' equals to 'Book gas participant yeah cost only.'
Check that 'description' equals to 'Brother finally each for current allow plan. Go deep painting sit husband indeed. Different sit sell energy.'
